description: I caught Scott playing Pokemon Go in the park and his nerdy/muscle dude look instantly turned me on.  We chatted for a while and I discovered that he was a bit of an exhibitionist, so it was a bit easier to get him to take his shirt off and touch his statuesque body in public. I offered him some money to jerk me off and seeing his massive hands on my dick turned me on even more, so I got him to bend over and let me fuck his perfect ass… for the right price of course.
title: Scott
